text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo What you'll be remembered for is enabling a #RussianAsset for 4 years, swimming in the Senate pool while awaiting coronavirus test results, and getting your *ss handed to you by your neighbor. You're as big a laughingstock and disgrace as #FredsFailure , #TreasonousTrump .
